name: Dental Crisis
description:
-------------------------------------------
The planet Mol-tak, home to the Dentient aliens, has become overrun with dangerous bacteria. As a Space Blaster sent by The Interplanetary Worlds Union (IWU), it is your job to help the Dentients clean up germs and stop this Dental Crisis! Don't forget to brush and floss!

Dental Crisis Features:

  • 10 unique area to explore
  • An upgradable 'Fluoride Blaster'
  • 4 crazy bosses to defeat
  • Goofy, nonthreatening giant teeth! Completely friendly!
Currently, only a short demo is available

-------------------------------------------

This is a short, 3d platformer styled after promotional games like  Chex Quest. This is a companion piece to Crisis on Dental Colony DDS-426 and made for a local game jam.

CONTROLS

WSAD - MOVE
SPACEBAR - JUMP
SHIFT - RUN
MOUSE2 - AIM
MOUSE1 - SHOOT(NOTE: shooting without aiming is funky)
E - INTERACT
